sourcesContent:
<template lang="">
  <v-container>
    <v-row>
      <v-col>
        <v-card>
          <v-form
            ref="form"
            @submit.prevent="submitForm"
            class="pa-5"
            enctype="multipart/form-data"
          >
            <v-text-field v-model="products.title" label="title" :rules="rules"></v-text-field>
            <v-text-field v-model="category" label="category" :rules="rules"></v-text-field>
            <v-text-field v-model="content" label="content" :rules="rules"></v-text-field>
            <v-file-input label="select image" :rules="rules"></v-file-input>
            <v-btn type="submit" @change="selectFile" color="primary"
              >add</v-btn
            >
          </v-form>
        </v-card>
      </v-col>
    </v-row>
  </v-container>
</template>
<script>
export default {
  data() {
    return {
      rules: [(value) => !!value || "this field is requied"],
      products: {
        title: "",
        category: "",
        content: "",
        image: "",
      },
      image: "",
    };
  },
  methods: {
    selectFile(file) {
      this.image = file[0];
    },
  },
  async submitForm() {
    const formData = new FormData();
    formData.append("image", this.image);
    formData.append("title", this.products.title);
    formData.append("category", this.products.category);
    formData.append("content", this.products.content);
  },
};
</script>
<style lang=""></style>
